attributes.action: Call a General Election so the people can decide the 3rd Prime Minister of 2022
attributes.additional_details: The Conservative Party have lost control of Westminster.  It is vital that we end the chaos that they have created by calling for a General Election as soon as possible.
attributes.background: There have now been two Prime Minister resignations during 2022 alone.  The Conservative Party have crashed the economy and have now caused greater chaos at Westminster.  The entire electorate should decide who will be 3rd Prime Minister of this year, not just the members of the Conservative Party.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
